item.title: Need help with Shops
item.dc:creator: @qauters qauters
item.description:
@qauters wrote:

Nope, we got a new shop system. It’s located at 620 and also 621 is made when opening a shop.
621 is drawn at your inventory (real inventory), but doesn’t contain items.
620.23 and 620.24 are drawn on the shop’s inventory, but this also doesn’t contain any items.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with Shops
item.dc:creator: @qauters qauters
item.description:
@qauters wrote:

For somereason I can’t find where shop items are stored. I believe this is because of infinity these days.
Anyone have a clue how it’s stored now?

Some data:
//Store
public static final int INTERFACE_STORE = 620;
public static final int ITNERFACE_STORE_BUTTON_CLOSE = 7;
public static final int ITNERFACE_STORE_BUTTON_PLAYERSTORE = 17;
public static final int ITNERFACE_STORE_BUTTON_MAINSTORE = 20;
